text: Ciguna muşrikon metavonand nazdi Alloh taolo va pajomʙaraş [ahdu] pajmone doşta ʙoşand? Magar [dar mavridi] kasone, ki ʙo onon nazdiki Masçidu-l-harom [dar Hudajʙija] pajmon ʙastaed. Pas, to [muşrikon dar mavridi on ahd] ʙo şumo pojdorand, şumo [niz] ʙo onon pojdor ʙoşed, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo parhezgoronro dūst medorad
